post:
Hello all,
OVHcloud is already sold out on all our special SYS (So You Start) black friday offers but we have added a new special Dedicated Server offer below.
Many other offers are still available including in the asia-pacific region on Dedi, VPS and more. Check links below.

--> Rise-LE-5 US$ 53.99/month Recurring price, NO setup fee, NO commitment required

  • Intel Xeon E3-1230v6 - 4 c/8 t
  • 3.50GHz/3.90GHz
  • 2 x 450GB NVMe softRAID SSD
  • 16GB DDR4 ECC 2,400 MHz
  • 500Mbit/s bandwidth
  • Anti-DDoS Protection
  • 500GB Backup storage space
  • Europe and North-America locations
  • No setup fees
  • Additional discount applies for the length of the commitment period chosen (12 or 24 months)

View offers, are you from?:

  • Australia (A$): https://www.ovh.com.au/black-friday/
  • Singapore (S$): https://www.ovh.com/sg/black-friday/
  • Asia (US$): https://www.ovh.com/asia/black-friday/
  • Rest of the world (US$): https://www.ovh.com/world/black-friday/

or to be redirected to your local OVH website, visit https://www.ovh.com/black-friday/
